text: lust is an intoxicating feeling it goes
beyond curiosity it goes beyond passion
and it's the type of feeling that embeds

Primal and ingrained in your DNA you

video is not intended to demean or shame

might just discover which one you have
sexual lust all forms of lust are more
than just a general want for something

something prioritizing it and pursuing

and intimacy just for the sake of it you

Order are often helpful and necessary in

material lust we all have felt the
stting of jealousy when someone is

a burning lust for material possessions
in you material lust can cover anything

possessions and wealth probably won't

nothing wrong with having nice things
but keeping your life varied and drawing

things can make life feel more
fulfilling intellectual lust nobody
knows everything there's no Grand wizard

that can tell you everything about
everything some people want to be that

this video everything is better in

growth alignment or connection with the
Divine but excessive spiritual lust can

achievements potentially overshadowing

should if you never feel like your
spiritual lust is being satiated you

spiritual lust can make you feel like

it can also lead you down the path of

Greater spiritual standing religious

Behavior which can alienate people
